item.title: Summoners Royale
item.description: A Real time PvP strategy game for android (web3), empowering players with strategic decisions in intense tactical battles. Overview Summoners Royale is truly a fascinating project. Resurrected from the dead (previously known as United Legends), Summoners Royale made deep impactful changes to its design to create a new gameplay expreince that could match the spirit of the company that produces it and to become a unique skill based game set against the agressive models of the web3 gaming.

item.title: Project Name
